From the following please extract the verbs

It depends on the type and size of the drone and the Raspberry Pi. Some drones can carry a Raspberry Pi as a payload, such as the PiWings project that uses a Raspberry Pi Pico to control a quadcopter1. Other drones can use a Raspberry Pi as a companion computer, such as the Autonomous Drone Using RPi project that uses a Raspberry Pi 3 B+ to communicate with a Pixhawk flight controller2. You can also build your own drone using a Raspberry Pi and some other components, such as the Raspberry Pi Drone project that uses a Raspberry Pi Zero W and a Navio2 board3.

1. "It depends on the type and size of the drone and the Raspberry Pi" means that the feasibility of carrying a Raspberry Pi as a payload on a drone depends on the type and size of the drone, as well as the Raspberry Pi itself.
2. "Some drones can carry a Raspberry Pi as a payload" means that certain drones are designed and capable of transporting a Raspberry Pi as a payload or component.
3. "Other drones can use a Raspberry Pi as a companion computer" means that some drones are equipped with a Raspberry Pi to serve as a secondary computer that works in conjunction with other hardware, such as a flight controller.

Therefore, the verbs "carry", "use", and "build" are used to describe different scenarios in which a Raspberry Pi can be integrated with drones.
Next, use picture descriptions for each word in the verb list

1. "It depends on the type and size of the drone and the Raspberry Pi" - This sentence means that the feasibility of carrying a Raspberry Pi as a payload on a drone depends on the type and size of both the drone and the Raspberry Pi. A visual representation of this could be a person holding a drone with different parts (e.g. motors, battery, etc.) and comparing it to a Raspberry Pi to show how the size and weight of each affect their compatibility.
2. "Some drones can carry a Raspberry Pi as a payload" - This sentence means that some drones are designed to transport a Raspberry Pi as a payload. A visual representation of this could be a drone with a compartment to hold a Raspberry Pi, and a person holding a Raspberry Pi to show the size comparison with the drone.
3. "Other drones can use a Raspberry Pi as a companion computer" - This sentence means that some drones use a Raspberry Pi as a secondary computer that works in conjunction with other hardware. A visual representation of this could be a drone with a Raspberry Pi installed in a separate compartment from the flight controller, and a person holding both the drone and the Raspberry Pi to show the relationship between the two.
